meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>hand</kanji>s are <kanji>light</kanji> because it was a <vocabulary>simple and easy</vocabulary> task, so you didn't get your hands full. This word describes something that's hassle-free and doesn't take much effort, time, or sometimes cost to do.
readingMnemonic: Both kanji use kun'yomi readings in this word, which you've already learned. Just make sure you rendaku the 軽.
